name: Jade colin
coverLetter:
Hey my name jade colin 26 years old originally from france been in the states for 12years. I have been in the area since last winter i absolutely fell in love with the industry and would love to learn more and help in any ways possible. I have trimmed i have harvests i have planted and cloned plants. I am motivated and exicted for this new season. I am in covelo at the moment trying to relocate to ferndale eureka area this week. 
Hope to hear back from you soon.
Thank you.
